title: README should link to new cpp_extension
body_html:
Section titled "Extensions without Pain" (in main README.md) should probably include some links to cpp_extension.

  • Currently just links to: https://pytorch.org/tutorials/advanced/c_extension.html
  • Should also link to: https://pytorch.org/tutorials/advanced/cpp_extension.html

@goldsborough Since cpp_extension is your thing, any thoughts about how to update the description in the README? It might also make sense to add a link from c_extension to cpp_extension.

Cheers

body:
Section titled "Extensions without Pain" (in main README.md) should probably include some links to cpp_extension. 
- Currently just links to: https://pytorch.org/tutorials/advanced/c_extension.html
- Should also link to: https://pytorch.org/tutorials/advanced/cpp_extension.html

@goldsborough Since cpp_extension is your thing, any thoughts about how to update the description in the README? It might also make sense to add a link from c_extension to cpp_extension.

Cheers
